title: “Kochs, votes, and ostrich coats.”
description: Trump obstructs justice via Twitter, Manafort faces a jury, and the Koch brothers pick a fight with Trump Republicans on trade. Then Dan talks to Nick Thompson of Wired about the fantastic job Facebook has been doing lately. And Jason Kander joins Lovett and Dan to talk about protecting the vote and his new book, “Outside the Wire.”
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)

And Jason Kander joins Lovett and Dan to talk about protecting the vote and his new book, “Outside the Wire.”
